name: Brisk Repair (Saym)
description:
This game was created during a 48 hours global  game jam 2020. The theme was "Repair". 
Instruction:
* Left mouse click to pick up a piece.
* Mouse wheel to rotate picked up piece.
* Left click to place the piece where you think it fits.
* You have 20 seconds to complete a level.
* If you click quit in the menu , you have to reload the page to play again.
